project.title: Moreland Middle School
project.description: Added new permanent facilities to replace these modular buildings. The final new construction project for the site was a 2-story building with 9 classrooms and a media center to replace the remaining portable classrooms, provide a larger media center, and allow for the conversion of the existing media center to classrooms. In addition, a new parking lot was built at the location of the existing modular buildings.

meta.title: McKim Design Group - Architecture & Design
meta.description: McKim Design Group is a highly-regarded full-service architecture firm located in San Jose, California.
